description:
Caiman sneaks into the festival grounds in pursuit of Risu. Meanwhile, En tells Fujita the story of how Shin and Noi became partners.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Aa, "Hana Kemuri" / Suteki na Meat Pie / Chin Kinoko Shutsugen!!
Oh, Flower Smoke / Awesome Meat Pie / A Macabre Mushroom Appears!!
嗚呼, 『花煙』 / すてきなミートパイ / 珍キノコ出現!!
